Hello John,

I just have a few comments regarding your Pluralsight course “Single Page Apps with HTML5, Web API, Knockout and jQuery”. It is a good course but a few things make it very difficult to follow.

  1. You didn’t build the project from scratch. You showed how the projects were created initially but soon after you demonstrated parts of the project with all the files in place. I don’t think this is ideal way to learn, it would be much better if we build some parts, test, then build, test etc.

  2. This NLipsum thing is very annoying, I have no idea what it is and my VS2015 can’t resolve it. I’ve tried everything including copy all the folder contents in my local VS project folder. I don’t even think it is necessarily, really don’t understand why you decided to include this esoteric feature in a beginner course. Please give me some tips on how I can get NLipsum working.

  3. I tried opening the project folder sln directly from VS and it says it can’t be opened.
